name: WebTrain - BlueTrain
tag_list: online-meetings, online-meeting, webinars, webinar, web-conference, web-conferences, web-conferencing, online-auction, online-auctions, online-sales
overview:
BlueTrain offers web conferencing, webinar and online meeting services.

Connects with people online to save money, make money and reduce your carbon footprint. BlueTrain’s real-time online meeting center enables you to easily present, discuss, interact, respond, vote, upload, download, share desktops, broadcast applications, present slide shows and more with hundreds of people.

BlueTrain connects people online from their home, office, or classroom. Participants no longer need to be in the same physical location, they can participate in web conferences virtually, from their home, office, hotel room or even at airports. Virtualization of online meetings is now becoming common among successful organizations whose offices or clients span different regions or time zones.

BlueTrain offers online business meetings, web conferences, educational training and courses, customer support, online sales, and more. Get on board - connect with people online.
